rooms.description: Central living area with eco-friendly materials and natural ventilation openings.
Open-plan dining space integrated into the living room for social gatherings.
Modern eco-friendly kitchen with ample natural light through a skylight and windows.
Eco-designed guest bedroom featuring an expansive balcony for natural light and ventilation.
Area for utilities and storage, designed with sustainability in mind.

openings.description: Large glass door ensuring ample natural light while maintaining privacy.
Large window openings integrated into each bedroom to allow for abundant sunlight and fresh air.
Skylight providing direct natural light and aiding in ventilation in the kitchen area.
